alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:02PM CDT until May 06 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 902 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Belvidere, or 25 miles west of Fairbury, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail, 60 mph wind gusts, and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reynolds, Fairbury, Endicott, Jansen and Steele City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
